text: The decisions that cost some lives and saved others during Helene’s wrathVictims and survivors filmed Helene’s flooding in Tennessee, showing what went wrong as a hospital was evacuated and six people were swept away at a nearby factory.By Samuel Oakford, Kim Bellware and Silvia Foster-FrauAt left, a helicopter rescues survivors washed away from a factory in Erwin, Tenn. At right, people are evacuated from a hospital. (Jacob Ingram, left, and Trey Moore)
html:
The decisions that cost some lives and saved others during Helene’s wrath

Victims and survivors filmed Helene’s flooding in Tennessee, showing what went wrong as a hospital was evacuated and six people were swept away at a nearby factory.

By Samuel Oakford, Kim Bellware and Silvia Foster-Frau

At left, a helicopter rescues survivors washed away from a factory in Erwin, Tenn. At right, people are evacuated from a hospital. (Jacob Ingram, left, and Trey Moore)
